## IPassthroughLocaleOptions interface

Options for the passthrough locale.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IPassthroughLocaleOptions
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                                                    | Modifiers | Type    | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [passthroughLocaleName?](./webpack5-localization-plugin.ipassthroughlocaleoptions.passthroughlocalename.md) |           | string  | <i>(Optional)</i> If [IPassthroughLocaleOptions.usePassthroughLocale](./webpack5-localization-plugin.ipassthroughlocaleoptions.usepassthroughlocale.md) is set, use this name for the passthrough locale. Defaults to "passthrough" |
| [usePassthroughLocale?](./webpack5-localization-plugin.ipassthroughlocaleoptions.usepassthroughlocale.md)   |           | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> If this is set to <code>true</code>, a passthrough locale will be included in the output                                                                                                                          |
